Header: Removal of unauthorised banners being carried out effectively: Elections Secretariat
Content: The Elections Secretariat states that the removal of unauthorised banners and posters is being carried out effectively. Speaking to News1st Deputy Elections Commissioner U.Â  Amaradasa stated that the necessary instructions in this regard have been provided to all district elections secretariat offices. Meanwhile, election monitors state that the distribution of goods in relation to the elections has increased. Speaking to News1st, Executive Director of CAFFE Keerthi Tennekoon stated that 700 instances of election violence have been reported so far. Executive Director of PAFFREL Rohana Hettiarachchi stated that 585 instances of election violence have been reported to their organization.
